response.original_title: Trashing and Gassing in Miami: The 1972 Republican Convention
response.overview: Videotaped at the 1972 Republican Convention, Videofreex's cameraperson tapes from inside the press area with protestors from the Peopleâ€™s Band outside at the fence. A group of protestors are shown calling for non-violent blockades of the delegates' entrance. Tear gas is feared, and there are interviews with victims and medics.
response.title: Trashing and Gassing in Miami: The 1972 Republican Convention
